hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (PEPE, DOGE) Intraday Washout Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: For high-beta meme coins (PEPE, DOGE), a rapid intraday price drop of 8-12% within 2 hours, on elevated but not climactic volume (< 3x average), during a BULL or NEUTRAL regime, will be followed by a sharp rebound of at least 50% of the initial drop, providing a profitable long scalp.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins are driven by retail sentiment and often experience sharp, panic-driven sell-offs during broader bullish/neutral conditions. These are frequently overdone as weak hands are flushed out, creating a temporary vacuum that is filled by opportunistic buyers aiming for a quick rebound. The volume filter avoids capitulation events.
entry_conditions: Price drops 8-12% from its 2-hour high within a 2-hour window
Volume during drop is > 1.5x but < 3x the 2-hour average
No similar magnitude drop occurred in the prior 24 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price recovers 50% of the initial 8-12% drop
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price falls an additional 3% from the entry point

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The rebound fails to capture 50% of the drop in over 50% of instances, or the stop-loss is hit before the take-profit in the majority of trades.
